distribute().notice: send epoch reward to staking contract

nextRewardAt(uint256).notice: view function for next reward at given rate

nextRewardDenom().notice: for informational purposesview function for next reward's quadratic denominator

nextRewardDenomWith18().notice: view function for next reward's quadratic denominator, with 18 decimals

nextRewardFor(address).notice: view function for next reward for specified address

setAdjustment(uint256,bool,uint256,uint2.notice: set adjustment info for a collector's reward rate

sqrt(uint256).notice: for informational purposespure function for sqrt

sqrtFraction(uint256,uint256).notice: for informational purposespure function for sqrt of fraction

sqrtFractionWith18(uint256,uint256).notice: for informational purposespure function for sqrt of fraction, with 18 decimals
